verses.verse: And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H596>complained,<s%> it <S%H7451>displeased<s%> <S%H241><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it; and his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled;<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1197>burnt<s%> among them, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> them that were in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> parts of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H8257>quenched.<s%>
And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H8404>Taberah:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1197>burnt<s%> among them.

And the mixed <S%H628>multitude<s%> that was <S%H7130>among<s%> them fell a <S%H8378>lusting:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall give us <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat?<s%>

We <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H1710>fish,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we did <S%H398>eat<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H2600>freely;<s%> the <S%H7180>cucumbers,<s%> and the <S%H20>melons,<s%> and the <S%H2682>leeks,<s%> and the <S%H1211>onions,<s%> and the <S%H7762>garlic:<s%>

But <S%H6258>now<s%> our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H3001>dried<s%> away: there is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> at <S%H3605>all,<s%> <S%H1115>beside<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4478>manna,<s%> before our <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
And the <S%H4478>manna<s%> was as <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and the <S%H5869>color<s%> thereof as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of <S%H916>bdellium.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7751>went<s%> <S%H7751>about,<s%> and <S%H3950>gathered<s%> it, and <S%H2912>ground<s%> it in <S%H7347>mills,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1743>beat<s%> it in a <S%H4085>mortar,<s%> and <S%H1310>baked<s%> it in <S%H6517>pans,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> of it: and the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of it was as the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of <S%H3955>fresh<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
And when the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H3381>fell<s%> on the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H3381>fell<s%> on it.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of his <S%H168>tent:<s%> and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also was <S%H5869>displeased.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> have you <S%H7489>afflicted<s%> your <S%H5650>servant?<s%> and <S%H4100>why<s%> have I not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> that you <S%H7760>lay<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> on me?

Have I <S%H2029>conceived<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> have I <S%H3205>begotten<s%> them, that you should <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H5375>Carry<s%> them in your <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> as a <S%H539>nursing<s%> father <S%H5375>bears<s%> the <S%H3243>sucking<s%> child, to the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers?<s%>

From <S%H370>where<s%> should I have <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> for they <S%H1058>weep<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> us <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat.<s%>
I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is too <S%H3515>heavy<s%> for me.

And <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H3602>thus<s%> with me, <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, out of <S%H2026>hand,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight;<s%> and let me not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H7451>wretchedness.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H622>Gather<s%> to me <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> to be the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> over them; and <S%H3947>bring<s%> them to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> that they may <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with you.

And I will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> with you <S%H8033>there:<s%> and I will <S%H680>take<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on you, and will <S%H7760>put<s%> it on them; and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with you, that you <S%H5375>bear<s%> it not yourself <S%H905>alone.<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> you to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves against to <S%H4279>morrow,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> for you have <S%H1058>wept<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall give us <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat?<s%> for it was <S%H2895>well<s%> with us in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat.<s%>

You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> two <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%>

But <S%H5704>even<s%> a <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> it <S%H3318>come<s%> out at your <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> and it be <S%H2214>loathsome<s%> to you: <S%H3282>because<s%> that you have <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and have <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> we <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I am, are <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen;<s%> and you have <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> a <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

Shall the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and the <S%H1241>herds<s%> be <S%H7819>slain<s%> for them, to <S%H4672>suffice<s%> them? or shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be <S%H622>gathered<s%> together for them, to <S%H4672>suffice<s%> them?

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> waxed <S%H7114>short?<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> whether my <S%H1697>word<s%> shall <S%H7136>come<s%> to pass to you or not.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> them <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in a <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him, and <S%H680>took<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> that was on him, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2205>elders:<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that, when the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> on them, they <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> and did not <S%H3254>cease.<s%>

But there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H419>Eldad,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4312>Medad:<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> on them; and they were of them that were <S%H3789>written,<s%> but <S%H3318>went<s%> not out to the <S%H168>tabernacle:<s%> and they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And there <S%H7323>ran<s%> a <S%H5288>young<s%> man, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H419>Eldad<s%> and <S%H4312>Medad<s%> do <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H8334>servant<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> one of his <S%H979>young<s%> men, <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3607>forbid<s%> them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7065>Envy<s%> you for my sake? <S%H4310>would<s%> <S%H5414><s%> God that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4310>would<s%> <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> on them!
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H622>got<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And there <S%H5265>went<s%> <S%H5265>forth<s%> a <S%H7307>wind<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H1468>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quails<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and let them <S%H5203>fall<s%> by the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> as it were a <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> on <S%H3541>this<s%> <S%H3541>side,<s%> and as it were a <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> on the <S%H3541>other<s%> <S%H3541>side,<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and as it were two <S%H520>cubits<s%> high on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6965>stood<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7958>quails:<s%> he that gathered <S%H4591>least<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2563>homers:<s%> and they <S%H7849>spread<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7849>abroad<s%> for <S%H1992>themselves<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And while the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> their <S%H8127>teeth,<s%> <S%H2962>ere<s%> it was <S%H3772>chewed,<s%> the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4347>plague.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6914>Kibrothhattaavah:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H183>lusted.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6914>Kibrothhattaavah<s%> to <S%H2698>Hazeroth;<s%> and <S%H1961>stayed<s%> at <S%H2698>Hazeroth.<s%>
